com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.mob

Class RangedMob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Entity
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.PhysicsEntity
        • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Character
          • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.mob.Mob
            • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.mob.MeleeMob
              • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.mob.RangedMob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BossMob, GunnerMob

    public class RangedMob
extends MeleeMob
    A Base for a Mob that prefers guns to punches (or rational discussion!). Must be American.

    • Field Detail

      • range

        public static float range
        The range to stop and shoot at the player. Anywhere outside this range, the mob won't shoot at the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RangedMob

        public RangedMob(Round parent,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 int health,
                 TextureSet textureSet,
                 int speed,
                 AI ai)
        Create a new RangedMob.
        Parameters:
        parent - the round parent.
        x - the initial x position.
        y - the initial y position.
        health - the starting health.
        textureSet - a TextureSet to use for displaying.
        speed - the speed to approach the player.
        ai - the AI type to use.

      • RangedMob

        public RangedMob(Round parent,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 int health,
                 TextureSet textureSet,
                 int speed)
        Create a new Mob with a default PathfindingAI.
        Parameters:
        parent - the round parent.
        x - the initial x position.
        y - the initial y position.
        health - the starting health.
        textureSet - a TextureSet to use for displaying.
        speed - the speed to approach the player.
